{{Infobox Berry |name = #48 Kasib |image = [[File:Kasib.png]] |caption = Considered to have a special power from the olden days, this Berry is sometimes dried and used as a good-luck charm. Nearby Pok√©mon are wary of this Berry plant. |growtime = 5m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 100% |points = 25 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *20 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Kasib''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by letting any berry wither after unlocking [[Occa]] or any later berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 30 secs || 1 min || 2 mins || 5 mins |- ! Animation | [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (wandering chance) | ||
x0.99 ||
x0.98 ||
